text: Muvanhu mune vamwe vanoti: “Tinotenda muna Allah.” Asi akawana dambudziko munzira yaAllah, anobva aona kunge muedzo wevanhu semarwadzo aAllah; uye kana kukunda kukauya kubva kuna Tenzi vako, (vanyengedzi) vanobva vati: “Zvirokwazvo, taive pamwechete (tichikubatsirai).” Asi Allah havazive here zviri mumoyo yevanhu nemaJinn
